|Title=Photograph/video of central facial paralysis
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=

Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

properties.question: What is the most likely cause of central facial paralysis as seen in a photograph/video?
properties.option_a: Bell's palsy affecting the peripheral nerves
properties.option_c: Infection causing inflammation of the facial muscles
properties.option_d: Trauma leading to damage of the facial nerve
